医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示DNA折叠如何驱动基因活动爆发九州大学的研究人员揭示了 DNA 特定区域之间的空间距离如何与基因活动爆发相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-reveals-how-DNA-folding-drives-gene-activity-bursts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-reveals-how-DNA-folding-drives-gene-activity-bursts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=419391d7-9057-4698-9a41-16a701f7c0a1 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:55:00 -0500 Study reveals how DNA folding drives gene activity bursts
新研究显示墨西哥年轻人受高温影响最严重最近的许多研究认为，随着地球变暖，老年人特别容易死于酷热。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Young-adults-hit-hardest-by-heat-in-Mexico-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Young-adults-hit-hardest-by-heat-in-Mexico-new-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=810ccb93-96fd-497e-aefa-3923b2fd7379 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:48:00 -0500 Young adults hit hardest by heat in Mexico, new study shows
范德比尔特大学医学中心获得 700 万美元用于研究重症监护中的呼吸管尺寸范德比尔特大学医学中心已获得以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 批准的 700 万美元研究经费，用于研究呼吸管尺寸对危重病后呼吸、说话和吞咽的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Vanderbilt-University-Medical-Center-receives-247-million-to-study-breathing-tube-size-in-ritic-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Vanderbilt-University-Medical-Center-receives-247-million-to-study-breathing-tube-size-in-ritic-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e7e2653-6d7f-4ea8-b472-cbae83c51b01 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:40:00 -0500 Vanderbilt University Medical Center receives $7 million to study breathing tube size in critical care
细菌毒素可能促进结直肠癌转移佛罗里达大学健康癌症中心的研究人员和国际合作者领导的一项研究发现，细菌中的毒素是食源性疾病最常见的原因之一，它会加速结直肠肿瘤向身体其他部位的扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Bacterial-toxin-may-fuel-colorectal-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Bacterial-toxin-may-fuel-colorectal-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba2755c1-250e-444f-ad35-c1efd2820350 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Bacterial toxin may fuel colorectal cancer metastasis
150 万美元赠款支持大学医院的阿片类药物替代方案卫生与公共服务部通过其药物滥用和心理健康服务管理局 (SAMHSA) 提供近 150 万美元的拨款，将使大学医院克利夫兰医学中心能够在其急诊科内开发和实施阿片类药物替代品 (ALTO) 计划。埃德）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/2415-million-Grant-supports-alternatives-to-opioids-initiative-at-University-Hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/2415-million-Grant-supports-alternatives-to-opioids-initiative-at-University-Hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13b5dd85-9a40-4cc6-8ff7-832d8137a1d6 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:25:00 -0500 $1.5 million grant supports alternatives to opioids initiative at University Hospitals
MRI 研究为乳糜泻治疗提供了新见解专家们使用磁共振成像（MRI）来更好地了解无麸质饮食对乳糜泻患者的影响，这可能是寻找治疗这种疾病的新方法的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MRI-study-offers-new-insights-into-celiac-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MRI-study-offers-new-insights-into-celiac-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25b2069a-7003-46b9-b1de-77005de8b758 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:17:00 -0500 MRI study offers new insights into celiac disease treatment
新疫苗方法显示出对抗丙型肝炎的希望全球约有5800万人慢性感染HCV，每年导致29万人因肝硬化和肝癌等并发症死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-against-Hepatitis-C.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-against-Hepatitis-C.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a892435-1cb5-4f62-a0e0-0b21c6b0eba9 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:10:00 -0500 New vaccine approach shows promise against Hepatitis C
专家齐聚NCCN峰会 推广以患者为中心的癌症信息国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN)——领先癌症中心的非营利联盟——今天在华盛顿特区主办了患者倡导峰会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Experts-gather-at-NCCN-summit-to-promote- Patient-centered-cancer-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Experts-gather-at-NCCN-summit-to-promote- Patient-centered-cancer-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ab83b7e-db70-4ffa-8408-917c55ccd0d1 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 20:03:00 -0500 Experts gather at NCCN summit to promote patient-centered cancer information
儿童“尼曼-皮克C型”机制的新见解在《科学转化医学》杂志上，DZNE 和 LMU 医院的科学家报告了对“尼曼-匹克 C 型”(NPC) 机制的新见解，这是一种与痴呆症相关的罕见神经退行性疾病，早在儿童时期就可能出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-insights-into-the-mechanisms-of-Niemann-Pick-type-C-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-insights-into-the-mechanisms-of-Niemann-Pick-type-C-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1abf6fa6-5c26-48ad-b1c8-102a561c3199 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:54:00 -0500 New insights into the mechanisms of "Niemann-Pick type C" in children
双抗体疗法在治疗转移性结直肠癌方面显示出希望转移性结直肠癌（mCRC）仍然是一个艰巨的挑战，尤其是在一线治疗失败后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Dual-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Dual-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32bacad5-226f-4878-a795-186024ed4313 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:46:00 -0500 Dual-antibody therapy shows promise in treating metastatic colorectal cancer
